org.hps.monitoring.drivers.svt

Class SvtHitPlots

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.monitoring.drivers.svt.SvtHitPlots

  • public class SvtHitPlots
extends Driver
    Monitoring driver that provides information about the number of SVT hits per event.

        Create a plotter style.
        Parameters:
        sensor - : HpsSiSensor associated with the plot. This is used to set certain attributes based on the position of the sensor.

        yAxisTitle - : Title of the y axis
        Returns:
